Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Rosalba
Reviews.Content: Lovely camera, It lasted me less than a year because I dropped it in water :( but other than that its a great camera

Reviews.Title: junk
Reviews.Author: JH
Reviews.Content: Great product for a year... and then it just died.  I really liked it... until it died.  Overpriced for the lack of durability.

Reviews.Title: Good camera for the price
Reviews.Author: M. Montgomery
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera for my girlfriend for Christmas.  It is very user freindly and takes amazing photos.  Excellent product! I would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Good camera.
Reviews.Author: mf527
Reviews.Content: I purchased this as a gift for a friend that had a very old camera. Although I did not use it, it looks like a great buy for the $.

ProductInfo.Features:
Slim body small enough to fit in a pocket
5x Optical zoom
16 MP CCD sensor
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung ST76 16 MP Compact Digital Camera - Silver (EC-ST76ZZBPSUS)
